ARCH_001.full_title: (ARCH) The Thermal Sensor Interface Module (TSIM) shall consist of three components: Sensor Driver, Temperature Filter, and State Machine.
ARCH_001.title: (ARCH) The Thermal Sensor Interface Module (TSIM) shall consist of three components: Sensor Driver, Temperature Filter, and State Machine.

ARCH_DESIGN_001.description:
**States**:

- **SAFE**: Temperature within safe range (< 95°C)
- **UNSAFE**: Temperature exceeds threshold (≥ 100°C)

**Implementation**: :need:`CODE_IMPL_001`

**Tests**: :need:`TEST_THRESHOLD_001`, :need:`TEST_HYSTERESIS_001`
ARCH_DESIGN_001.full_title: (ARCH) Temperature monitoring shall be implemented as a state machine with two states: SAFE and UNSAFE.
ARCH_DESIGN_001.title: (ARCH) Temperature monitoring shall be implemented as a state machine with two states: SAFE and UNSAFE.

ARCH_DESIGN_002.full_title: (ARCH) The module shall store the last valid temperature reading and timestamp.
ARCH_DESIGN_002.title: (ARCH) The module shall store the last valid temperature reading and timestamp.

ARCH_DESIGN_003.description: **Rationale**: Prevents accidental or malicious threshold modification during operation.
ARCH_DESIGN_003.full_title: (ARCH) All temperature thresholds shall be stored in read-only configuration registers.
ARCH_DESIGN_003.title: (ARCH) All temperature thresholds shall be stored in read-only configuration registers.

ARCH_ERROR_001.description: **Rationale**: Conservative approach—hold last safe state rather than guess.
ARCH_ERROR_001.full_title: (ARCH) If sensor reading is invalid (out of physical bounds), the module shall remain in current state and log an error.
ARCH_ERROR_001.title: (ARCH) If sensor reading is invalid (out of physical bounds), the module shall remain in current state and log an error.

ARCH_ERROR_002.description:
**Rationale**: Domain-agnostic fail-safe for sensor degradation (medical, industrial, automotive contexts).

**Tested by**: :need:`TEST_FAIL_SAFE_001`
ARCH_ERROR_002.full_title: (ARCH) The module shall track sensor read failures; after 10 consecutive failures, it shall enter UNSAFE state.
ARCH_ERROR_002.title: (ARCH) The module shall track sensor read failures; after 10 consecutive failures, it shall enter UNSAFE state.

ARCH_FUNC_001.description:
**Rationale**: 100Hz > 2× highest temperature change rate expected in any domain.

**Tests**: :need:`TEST_CONVERSION_001`
ARCH_FUNC_001.full_title: (ARCH) The Sensor Driver shall read analog input at 100Hz sampling rate.
ARCH_FUNC_001.title: (ARCH) The Sensor Driver shall read analog input at 100Hz sampling rate.

ARCH_FUNC_002.full_title: (ARCH) The Temperature Filter shall apply a 5-sample moving average before state evaluation.
ARCH_FUNC_002.title: (ARCH) The Temperature Filter shall apply a 5-sample moving average before state evaluation.

ARCH_FUNC_003.full_title: (ARCH) The State Machine shall evaluate temperature against thresholds and output state transitions within 50ms of detection.
ARCH_FUNC_003.title: (ARCH) The State Machine shall evaluate temperature against thresholds and output state transitions within 50ms of detection.

ARCH_SEOOC_001.description:
**Integration Assumptions**:

- Integrating system has verified shutdown mechanism
- System controller responds to UNSAFE state within 1 second
- Sensor hardware meets ±2°C accuracy
- Operating environment is within -40°C to +80°C ambient

**Domain Examples** (shown above):

- **Medical**: Incubator/sterilizer temperature interlock (IEC 60601)
- **Industrial**: Process control thermal limits (IEC 61508)
- **Automotive**: Battery thermal management (ISO 26262)
- **Robotics**: Motor overtemperature protection (ISO 13849)
ARCH_SEOOC_001.full_title: (ARCH) The TSIM shall be a Safety Element out of Context (SEooC) assuming the integrating system provides safe shutdown capability.
ARCH_SEOOC_001.title: (ARCH) The TSIM shall be a Safety Element out of Context (SEooC) assuming the integrating system provides safe shutdown capability.

ARCH_SEOOC_002.description: **Rationale**: Enables domain-agnostic reuse across medical (controlled environments), industrial (process control), robotics (motor shutdown), and automotive (powertrain management).
ARCH_SEOOC_002.full_title: (ARCH) TSIM does not implement actual shutdown or corrective action; responsibility transfers to integrating system.
ARCH_SEOOC_002.title: (ARCH) TSIM does not implement actual shutdown or corrective action; responsibility transfers to integrating system.

ARCH_SIGNAL_001.description:
**ADC Resolution**: 12-bit (4096 steps)

**Range Mapping**:

- 0 LSB → -40°C
- 2048 LSB → 42.5°C
- 4095 LSB → ~125°C

**Tested by**: :need:`TEST_CONVERSION_001`
ARCH_SIGNAL_001.full_title: (ARCH) Raw Temperature Signal shall be a 12-bit analog input representing -40°C to +125°C.
ARCH_SIGNAL_001.title: (ARCH) Raw Temperature Signal shall be a 12-bit analog input representing -40°C to +125°C.

ARCH_SIGNAL_002.full_title: (ARCH) Temperature Reading shall be a 16-bit signed integer in units of 0.1°C.
ARCH_SIGNAL_002.title: (ARCH) Temperature Reading shall be a 16-bit signed integer in units of 0.1°C.

ARCH_SIGNAL_003.full_title: (ARCH) State Output shall be a 1-bit signal: 0=SAFE, 1=UNSAFE.
ARCH_SIGNAL_003.title: (ARCH) State Output shall be a 1-bit signal: 0=SAFE, 1=UNSAFE.

CODE_IMPL_001.description:
Each Python module, class, and function includes docstring comments mapping to:

- Safety Requirements (:need:`REQ_SAFETY_001`, :need:`REQ_SAFETY_002`, :need:`REQ_SAFETY_003`)
- Functional Requirements (:need:`REQ_FUNC_001`, :need:`REQ_FUNC_002`, :need:`REQ_FUNC_003`, :need:`REQ_FUNC_004`)
- Architecture Specifications (:need:`ARCH_001`, :need:`ARCH_FUNC_001`, :need:`ARCH_FUNC_002`, :need:`ARCH_FUNC_003`, :need:`ARCH_DESIGN_001`)
CODE_IMPL_001.full_title: (CODE) Implementation follows requirement IDs and architecture specifications.
CODE_IMPL_001.title: (CODE) Implementation follows requirement IDs and architecture specifications.

CODE_REPO_001.description:
**File Listing**:

- `01_requirements.rst` - Requirements specification
- `02_architecture.rst` - Architecture with diagrams
- `03_verification.rst` - Verification plan and traceability matrix
- `**04_implementation.rst**` - This file (code examples and test mapping)
- `conf.py` - Sphinx configuration
- `diagrams/` - PlantUML architecture diagrams
- `src/tsim.py` - Implementation with traceability comments
- `tests/test_tsim.py` - Comprehensive test suite
- `test_results.xml` - JUnit test results
CODE_REPO_001.full_title: (CODE) Complete example includes both documentation and implementation.
CODE_REPO_001.title: (CODE) Complete example includes both documentation and implementation.

REQ_FUNC_001.description:
**Output Range**: -40°C to +125°C (covers medical, industrial, automotive domains)

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_FUNC_001`, :need:`ARCH_SIGNAL_001`, :need:`ARCH_SIGNAL_002`

**Tests**: :need:`TEST_CONVERSION_001`
REQ_FUNC_001.full_title: (FR) The module shall read analog sensor input and convert it to temperature in degrees Celsius.
REQ_FUNC_001.title: (FR) The module shall read analog sensor input and convert it to temperature in degrees Celsius.

REQ_FUNC_002.description:
**Rationale**: Prevents spurious state changes from sensor noise.

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_FUNC_002`

**Tests**: :need:`TEST_FILTER_001`
REQ_FUNC_002.full_title: (FR) The module shall filter sensor noise using a 5-sample moving average.
REQ_FUNC_002.title: (FR) The module shall filter sensor noise using a 5-sample moving average.

REQ_FUNC_003.full_title: (FR) The module shall trigger a safe state alert when temperature ≥ 100°C (configurable threshold).
REQ_FUNC_003.title: (FR) The module shall trigger a safe state alert when temperature ≥ 100°C (configurable threshold).

REQ_FUNC_004.description:
**Rationale**: 5°C hysteresis prevents oscillation at threshold boundary.

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_DESIGN_001`

**Tests**: :need:`TEST_HYSTERESIS_001`
REQ_FUNC_004.full_title: (FR) The module shall trigger a recovery to normal state when temperature ≤ 95°C (hysteresis).
REQ_FUNC_004.title: (FR) The module shall trigger a recovery to normal state when temperature ≤ 95°C (hysteresis).

REQ_SAFETY_001.full_title: (SG) Prevent thermal damage by detecting abnormal temperature conditions and notifying the system to take corrective action.
REQ_SAFETY_001.title: (SG) Prevent thermal damage by detecting abnormal temperature conditions and notifying the system to take corrective action.

REQ_SAFETY_002.description:
**Rationale**: Timely detection enables corrective action before damage occurs.

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_FUNC_003`

**Tests**: :need:`TEST_END_TO_END_001`
REQ_SAFETY_002.full_title: (SR) The system shall detect when temperature exceeds the safe operating limit and report an unsafe state within 100ms.
REQ_SAFETY_002.title: (SR) The system shall detect when temperature exceeds the safe operating limit and report an unsafe state within 100ms.

REQ_SAFETY_003.description:
**Rationale**: Clear state transitions enable predictable system behavior.

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_ERROR_002`

**Tests**: :need:`TEST_FAIL_SAFE_001`
REQ_SAFETY_003.full_title: (SR) The system shall report a safe state when temperature returns to normal operating range.
REQ_SAFETY_003.title: (SR) The system shall report a safe state when temperature returns to normal operating range.

TEST_CODE_001.description:
**Test Coverage Matrix**:

- **TestSensorDriver**: Tests ARCH_FUNC_001, REQ_FUNC_001
  - `test_conversion_full_range` → TEST_CONVERSION_001
  - `test_conversion_accuracy` → TEST_CONVERSION_001

- **TestTemperatureFilter**: Tests ARCH_FUNC_002, REQ_FUNC_002
  - `test_filter_noise_rejection` → TEST_FILTER_001
  - `test_filter_stabilization` → TEST_FILTER_001

- **TestStateMachine**: Tests ARCH_DESIGN_001, REQ_FUNC_003/004
  - `test_threshold_detection` → TEST_THRESHOLD_001
  - `test_hysteresis_deadband` → TEST_HYSTERESIS_001
  - `test_state_output_bit` → ARCH_SIGNAL_003

- **TestTSIMIntegration**: Tests end-to-end ARCH_001
  - `test_end_to_end_latency` → TEST_END_TO_END_001
  - `test_detection_within_100ms` → TEST_END_TO_END_001
  - `test_safe_state_recovery` → REQ_SAFETY_003
  - `test_error_recovery` → TEST_ERROR_RECOVERY_001
  - `test_fail_safe_on_persistent_errors` → TEST_FAIL_SAFE_001

**Total**: 13 test cases covering 20+ requirements
TEST_CODE_001.full_title: (TEST) Test suite provides complete coverage of requirements.
TEST_CODE_001.title: (TEST) Test suite provides complete coverage of requirements.

TEST_CONVERSION_001.description:
**Test Steps**:

1. Input ADC values: 0, 1024, 2048, 3072, 4095 LSB
2. Verify output temperature: -40°C, -17.5°C, 42.5°C, 102.5°C, ~125°C

**Pass Criteria**: All conversions within ±1°C accuracy

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_FUNC_001`, :need:`ARCH_SIGNAL_001`
TEST_CONVERSION_001.full_title: (TEST) TEST_CONVERSION_001: Sensor readings across full range (-40°C to +125°C) shall convert correctly per :need:`REQ_FUNC_001`.
TEST_CONVERSION_001.title: (TEST) TEST_CONVERSION_001: Sensor readings across full range (-40°C to +125°C) shall convert correctly per :need:`REQ_FUNC_001`.

TEST_END_TO_END_001.description:
**Test Steps**:

1. Simulate analog sensor input ramping from 25°C to 105°C
2. Measure time from input change to state output change

**Pass Criteria**: End-to-end latency ≤ 50ms (margin within 100ms requirement)

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_001`, :need:`ARCH_FUNC_003`
TEST_END_TO_END_001.full_title: (TEST) TEST_END_TO_END_001: Full sensor-to-state pipeline shall operate within latency budget per :need:`REQ_SAFETY_002`.
TEST_END_TO_END_001.title: (TEST) TEST_END_TO_END_001: Full sensor-to-state pipeline shall operate within latency budget per :need:`REQ_SAFETY_002`.

TEST_ERROR_RECOVERY_001.description:
**Test Steps**:

1. Inject invalid readings (<-50°C or >150°C range)
2. Verify state remains unchanged for up to 9 errors
3. Inject valid reading; verify normal operation resumes

**Pass Criteria**: State unchanged during error sequence; recovery successful

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_ERROR_001`
TEST_ERROR_RECOVERY_001.full_title: (TEST) TEST_ERROR_RECOVERY_001: Module shall recover gracefully from persistent sensor errors per :need:`ARCH_ERROR_001`.
TEST_ERROR_RECOVERY_001.title: (TEST) TEST_ERROR_RECOVERY_001: Module shall recover gracefully from persistent sensor errors per :need:`ARCH_ERROR_001`.

TEST_EXEC_001.full_title: (TEST) All unit tests shall execute in ≤ 1 second; integration tests in ≤ 5 seconds.
TEST_EXEC_001.title: (TEST) All unit tests shall execute in ≤ 1 second; integration tests in ≤ 5 seconds.

TEST_FAIL_SAFE_001.description:
**Test Steps**:

1. Inject 10 consecutive invalid readings
2. Verify state transitions to UNSAFE
3. Confirm recovery pathway when valid readings resume

**Pass Criteria**: UNSAFE state triggered; system alerts integrating system

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_ERROR_002`, :need:`ARCH_SEOOC_001`
TEST_FAIL_SAFE_001.full_title: (TEST) TEST_FAIL_SAFE_001: After 10 consecutive sensor failures, module shall enter UNSAFE state per :need:`ARCH_ERROR_002`.
TEST_FAIL_SAFE_001.title: (TEST) TEST_FAIL_SAFE_001: After 10 consecutive sensor failures, module shall enter UNSAFE state per :need:`ARCH_ERROR_002`.

TEST_FILTER_001.description:
**Test Steps**:

1. Input noisy sequence: [50, 60, 45, 55, 50, 48, 52, 49]°C
2. After 5 samples, filter output shall stabilize around 50°C

**Pass Criteria**: Noise amplitude reduced by ≥80%

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_FUNC_002`, :need:`ARCH_SIGNAL_002`
TEST_FILTER_001.full_title: (TEST) TEST_FILTER_001: Noise filtering with 5-sample moving average shall suppress sensor noise per :need:`REQ_FUNC_002`.
TEST_FILTER_001.title: (TEST) TEST_FILTER_001: Noise filtering with 5-sample moving average shall suppress sensor noise per :need:`REQ_FUNC_002`.

TEST_HYSTERESIS_001.description:
**Test Steps**:

1. Set state: UNSAFE (T=100°C)
2. Lower temperature to 99°C (still below hysteresis) → state remains UNSAFE
3. Lower temperature to 95°C → state transitions to SAFE

**Pass Criteria**: Hysteresis deadband prevents spurious oscillations
TEST_HYSTERESIS_001.full_title: (TEST) TEST_HYSTERESIS_001: State machine shall transition to SAFE only when temperature ≤ 95°C (hysteresis) per :need:`REQ_FUNC_004`.
TEST_HYSTERESIS_001.title: (TEST) TEST_HYSTERESIS_001: State machine shall transition to SAFE only when temperature ≤ 95°C (hysteresis) per :need:`REQ_FUNC_004`.

TEST_METHOD_001.full_title: (TEST) Unit tests shall verify individual components (:need:`ARCH_FUNC_001` Sensor Driver, :need:`ARCH_FUNC_002` Filter, :need:`ARCH_FUNC_003` State Machine) in isolation.
TEST_METHOD_001.title: (TEST) Unit tests shall verify individual components (:need:`ARCH_FUNC_001` Sensor Driver, :need:`ARCH_FUNC_002` Filter, :need:`ARCH_FUNC_003` State Machine) in isolation.

TEST_METHOD_002.full_title: (TEST) Integration tests shall verify end-to-end data flow from sensor input to state output (:need:`ARCH_001` TSIM).
TEST_METHOD_002.title: (TEST) Integration tests shall verify end-to-end data flow from sensor input to state output (:need:`ARCH_001` TSIM).

TEST_METHOD_003.full_title: (TEST) Timing tests shall verify that all processing occurs within 100ms as specified in :need:`REQ_SAFETY_002`.
TEST_METHOD_003.title: (TEST) Timing tests shall verify that all processing occurs within 100ms as specified in :need:`REQ_SAFETY_002`.

TEST_REPORT_001.description: **Integration**: Configure sphinx-test-reports in ``conf.py`` to import test results into this documentation for automated compliance artifact generation.
TEST_REPORT_001.full_title: (TEST) Test results shall be exported in JUnit XML format for traceability reporting via sphinx-test-reports.
TEST_REPORT_001.title: (TEST) Test results shall be exported in JUnit XML format for traceability reporting via sphinx-test-reports.

TEST_THRESHOLD_001.description:
**Test Steps**:

1. Set initial state: SAFE (T=50°C)
2. Inject temperature: 100°C
3. Verify state output: UNSAFE

**Pass Criteria**: State transition occurs on first call after threshold exceeded

**Architecture**: :need:`ARCH_FUNC_003`, :need:`ARCH_DESIGN_001`
TEST_THRESHOLD_001.full_title: (TEST) TEST_THRESHOLD_001: State machine shall transition to UNSAFE when temperature ≥ 100°C per :need:`REQ_FUNC_003`.
TEST_THRESHOLD_001.title: (TEST) TEST_THRESHOLD_001: State machine shall transition to UNSAFE when temperature ≥ 100°C per :need:`REQ_FUNC_003`.

TEST_VERIFY_001.full_title: (TEST) Verification shall demonstrate that :need:`REQ_SAFETY_001`, :need:`REQ_SAFETY_002`, :need:`REQ_SAFETY_003`, and all functional requirements are met through unit tests and integration tests.
TEST_VERIFY_001.title: (TEST) Verification shall demonstrate that :need:`REQ_SAFETY_001`, :need:`REQ_SAFETY_002`, :need:`REQ_SAFETY_003`, and all functional requirements are met through unit tests and integration tests.

TRACE_TEST_001.full_title: REQ_SAFETY_002 shall be verified by TEST_DETECTION_001 and TEST_TIMING_001.
TRACE_TEST_001.title: REQ_SAFETY_002 shall be verified by TEST_DETECTION_001 and TEST_TIMING_001.

TRACE_TEST_002.full_title: REQ_FUNC_003 shall be verified by TEST_THRESHOLD_001.
TRACE_TEST_002.title: REQ_FUNC_003 shall be verified by TEST_THRESHOLD_001.
